content: Phase 1.1: Implement Enhanced Inter-Agent Communication Foundation
Create Pydantic models for structured inter-agent data transfer
Implement artifact management system for large data sharing
Set up Redis Pub/Sub for lightweight event notifications
Phase 1.2: Enhance Learning Feedback Loop Implementation
Apply insight logging decorator to all consolidated agents
Enhance InsightAgent with pattern recognition capabilities
Integrate Director Self-Improvement with InsightAgent suggestions
Phase 1.3: Build Advanced Simulation Orchestration System
Enhance DirectorAgent for domain-agnostic idea generation
Build DevelopmentAgent simulation code generation capabilities
Implement secure simulation execution with sandboxing
Build knowledge integration for simulation outcomes
Create comprehensive testing and validation framework
Document implementation progress and update plan
